The Popular

5 Popular Items of Today...Here is my list in no particular order.
  • iPad 2
  • Harry Potter 7 Part 2
  • Adele, Someone Like You
  • Xbox 360
  • Sleeping

1) iPad 2. Came out early 2011. 2 cameras, HD video recording, 10-hour battery, over 200 new features in IOS 5. It is 0.34" and weight about 1.33 lbs.
2) Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows Part2. Came out in July 2011. Got a rating of 8.2/10 and by the end of opening weekend made 160 million in just the US and almost 1.5 billion globally.
3) Adele, Someone Like You. Extremely popular song/artist/album at the time being. It has been listed for 505 weeks in 20 different top charts.
4) The Xbox 360. It has remained the top gaming system for quite a while. The PS3, Nintendo Wii, PSP Go and even Nintendo 3DS have remained below it. It has kept it's 4 star rating in all categories including features, performance, online community and technical support--unlike other systems.
5) Sleep. No one can ever say it isn't. It is by far the most popular thing in the ages of adolescence.
